game.name: All Queens Chess
game.board: All Queens Chess is played on five-row, five-column chessboard.
game.pieces: The first player has six white queens. The second player has six black queens. At the start of the game, the queens are arranged as follows:[img src="allqueenschess.svg" alt="aqc" width="300" height="300"]
game.tomove: Move one of your queens as you would in chess, except that you may not capture queens. In other words, you may move a queen any number of spaces horizontally, vertically, or diagonally to an unoccupied space as long as all spaces between the departure and destination spaces are unoccupied.
game.towin: Arrange four or five of your queens in a vertical, horizontal, or diagonal contiguous line.
